answer:
Where you can purchase and receive non publicly funded vaccines (like the shingles vaccine) does vary across BC.  At 411 Vaccines enter your postal code and search for clinics providing shingles vaccine. Contact the clinic of your choosing to confirm vaccine availability/make an appointment.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## Where you can purchase and receive non publicly funded vaccines (like the shingles vaccine) does vary across BC.

At 411 Vaccines enter your postal code and search for clinics providing shingles vaccine.
Contact the clinic of your choosing to confirm vaccine availability/make an appointment.
Immunization Nurse
question: We live in Coquitlam, BC and have a prescription for Shingrix but are having trouble filling the prescription due to shortages of the vaccine. When & where available in Coquitlam.
question_variation_1: is shinglesgrix vaccine available in coquitlam
question_variation_2: does shinglesgrix vaccine go to coquitlam
